architecture_overview: Agent-Wiz is a threat modeling tool with a frontend interface, backend API, database, and AI-driven analysis service. Components interact via secure APIs and data pipelines to enable threat modeling workflows.

components.name: Frontend
components.description: User interface for threat modeling tasks and visualization

components.name: Backend API
components.description: Handles business logic, authentication, and request routing

components.name: Database
components.description: Stores user data, threat models, and analysis results

components.name: AI Analysis Service
components.description: Provides threat intelligence and risk assessment capabilities

Persistent storage of threat models and user data
